duration.description: Duration of darkness effect. -1 for continuous effect

time.description: Transition time to new alpha value

blinkAlpha.description: If specified: alterate between alpha and blinkAlpha

time.description: Time to wait. -1 = Wait forever (use WISELY)

aggroTime.description: Only works when 'harder nemeies' new game option is selected

assistSlow.description: If true: Slow down in Assist Mode

condition.description: Condition that must be true before continued

maxTime.description: If defined: maximal wait this time
If defined: maximal wait this time

alsoBelowTarget.description: If true also cancel if below target

not.description: If true, wait until player is NOT on top anymore

maxTime.description: If defined: maximal wait this time

collideCancel.description: If defined: if angle to collided wall is lower than this value, cancel step

stopBeforeEdge.description: If true: Stop before falling down from edge when further moving forward

waitUntil.description: If defined: continue moving forward until condition evaluates to true. Duration is minimum wait

maxTargetDistance.description: If defined, make sure to not move further than this distance to target

stopBeforeEdge.description: If true: Stop before falling down from edge when further moving forward
If true: Stop before falling down from edge when further moving backward

subRadius.description: If true, substract radius of entity bounds from distance to be evaluated.

forceTime.description: If true: wait at point until maxTime has been reached

target.description: Point to go to

maxTime.description: If defined: move at most this amount of seconds towards point

forceTime.description: If true: wait at point until maxTime has been reached

entity.description: Other entity to sync action with

value.description: New Z Vel value. Positive for up movement

variance.description: New float variance (specifies how muchy entitie moves up and down during floating)

value.description: If true: Entity will keep flight height and not adjust with target

distance.description: Wait until z distance to target is below this value

fixEntityZ.description: If true, make entity stay fixed at the destination height, no zVel or gravity

target.description: Point to go to

flyVariance.description: How much the entity will vary around flight height.

precise.description: Reach the target precisely, slowing down accordingly

keepFloating.description: Keep floating in the air after step is over

time.description: Amount of time to move along this point

stopBeforeEdge.description: If true: Stop before falling down from edge when further moving forward

dirChanges.description: How often to change direction while moving. Minimum is 1

stopBeforeEdge.description: If true: Stop before falling down from edge when further moving forward

wait.description: Wait until entity landed on ground

ignoreSounds.description: If true, don't play any sound when jumping up

target.description: Point to jump to

forceDuration.description: If defined: force a specific jump duration, setting speed and velocity accordingly. Otherwise, jump height will adapted so point will be reached with current velocity

forceHeight.description: If defined: force a minimum height for jump

ignoreSounds.description: If true, don't play any sound when jumping up

size.description: Set new size of entity, keeping XY center alignment. WARNING: MIGHT RESULT IN PHYSICS ISSUES! ONLY USE WHEN NO OVERLAPPING WITH SURROUNDING IS GUARANTEED!

shiftOnCollision.description: If true: shift entity when colliding with walls on expansion. NOTE: MIGHT NOT ALWAYS WORK

value.description: New accel speed value. Something between 1 = fast acceleration. 0 = basically no acceleration

value.description: true iff slip through is active (ignoring any kind of collision)

followUp.description: Animation to play after this animation

radius.description: Radius up to which you can hear the sound

newZPos.description: New z post to move to.

noStateReset.description: If true, do not reset state before switching to action. Also keeps actionAttached!

resumeStashed.description: If true, resume stashed action if available

duration.description: The time the rumble will take. -1 for continues effect

fade.description: Rumble effect gets weaker towards the passed time.

factor.description: How much to slow down the time. 0.5 = half the speed

time.description: Transition time for slow motion removal

removeEntityStatic.description: If true, remove entity from static time

Amount of time to play animation.
0 = actual lenght of animation, -1 = forever until stopped.

rotOffset.description: X and Y offset that is rotated with face direction. Specified is vector for NORTH viewing direction

target.description: If not defined: use same target

rotateFace.description: If number is provided: rotate effect to match entity face, number matching possible face directions. -1 = take precise face rotation

target2Align.description: Alignment of Animation relative to target

fixPos.description: If true: show effect fixed at current entity pos

ignoreSlowMo.description: If true: ignore slow motion for this effect

group.description: If provided: only clear effects attached under specified group

name.description: Name of actor attribute to set

dirRotate.description: Additional rotation to preferred placement direction (relative to target)

fadeOut.description: Time in seconds for effect to fade out

Name of zoom blur to be faded out

target.description: On what target to apply influence

moveXYScale.description: Scale XY movement speed of target

time.description: Time in seconds the message should be visible. 0 = forever

actionDetached.description: If true, keep Message even after action is finished or canceled

partName.description: If provided: Show AR display to sub part of entity

tracker.description: If defined: bind time value of AR message to enemy tracker

rotateTime.description: Seconds for one full rotation. If not defined used current speed to determine rotation speed

distAdjustSpeed.description: Speed with which projectile adjust distance to target (pixel per seconds)

zDistance.description: If defined: Interpolate to this z Distance (with same speed as dist interpolation)

waitUntil.description: If defined: continue spinning until condition evaluates to true. Duration is minimum wait

waitTargetAlign.description: If true: keep rotating until rotate velocity roughly matches direction to target

value.description: True if enemy should always look at the target.

immediately.description: True if enemy should always look at the target IMMEDIATLY.

enemy.description: Enemy to unlock, note that this enemy, use this only for special enemies.

asSpecial.description: if true 'special' will be displayed instead of kill count

value.description: Offset to target direction to look into
Speed for face to target. Default is 2

target.description: Where is player found?

forceTime.description: Keep moving, never stop until maxTime has been reached

rotateSpeed.description: Speed in which entity will rotate to target. In rotations per seconds.

missReactTime.description: Reaction time to stop tackle after target has been clearly missed

collideCancel.description: If defined: if angle to collided wall is lower than this value, cancel step

stopBeforeEdge.description: If true: Stop before falling down from edge when further moving forward

moveTime.description: Time of movement. Entity will try to move exactly at target during that time

postTime.description: Amount of time still expected to move after this step. Approach is calculated that way

rotateSpeed.description: Speed in which entity will rotate to target. In rotations per seconds.

useAccelDir.description: If true, use current accelDir to determine initial movement direction. Use this to continue rotation from precious PINPOINT step

maxSpeed.description: Maximum velocity. Velocity will always be adapted to hit target at end of moveTime + postTime

maxSpeedEnd.description: Maximum velocity at end of movement. Speed will linear interpolate to this value if defined.

underEstimation.description: How much movement duration should be underestimated for speed adjustment. Lower value makes hitting target more reliable, but leads to initially fast movement

entityAttrib.description: Name of attrib to store entity

indexAttrib.description: Name of attrib to store entity index

entities.description: List of entities. Will move to one of those

attrib.description: Name of attribute that includes index of entity

distance.description: Distance to entity along position type

orthogonalDist.description: Orthogonal distance (Sideways) - can also be negative for opposite direction.

adjustTarget.description: If true, adjust orthogonal distance to fit target

maxTime.description: Maximum time to move. If 0: Move until target is reached

forceTime.description: Keep moving, never stop until maxTime has been reached

precise.description: If true, move to point precisely

saveToAttrib.description: If defined: don't move but instead save result position in attribute

selectBy.description: By which distance positionType is determined

party.description: Override party determine which things are hit

adjustAbove.description: Until how high above player X/Z movement should be adjusted

stopBeforeTime.description: Number of seconds to stop before target point has been reached.

distance.description: Close in to target up to this distance

rotateSpeed.description: Speed in which entity will rotate to target. In rotations per seconds.

adjustSpeedMax.description: If defined: optimized speed to hit target with up to this speed

turnMinSpeed.description: If defined: minimum speed when entity is rotating towards target. If not defined: will stop

missileMode.description: If set, move entity like missile flying right at entity with speed provided minimal zSpeed. ONLY WORKS WITH adjustSpeedMax defined.

underEstimation.description: How much jump duration should be underestimated for speed adjustment. Lower value makes hitting target more reliable, but leads to initially fast jump motion.

cancelIfBelowFall.description: If entity is falling and below target z pos

speed.description: Speed of Missile in pixel per seconds. Will be distributed to vel x/y/z to hit target on ground impact. Will always set gravityFactor to 0.

minTime.description: Minimum amount of time for flight of missile
Minimum amount of time to escape

maxTime.description: Maximum amount of time to escape

minTime.description: Minimum amount of time to circle target

maxTime.description: Maximum amount of time to circle target

keepFaceDirection.description: Move so direction which is closer to face direction

towardsRotate.description: Rotate direction slightly towards target. If negative: away

towardMinDist.description: If defined: minimum, distance to keep when rotating towards player. (Rotate away otherwise)

stopBeforeEdge.description: If true: Stop before falling down from edge when further moving forward

target.description: Type of target

align.description: Alignment of to target

waitUntil.description: If defined: continue spinning until condition evaluates to true. Duration is minimum wait

target.description: Type of target

rotateTime.description: Seconds for one full rotation. If not defined used current speed to determine rotation speed

rotateTimeEnd.description: Value for rotation speed at end of duration. Speed will be interpolated.

distAdjustSpeed.description: Speed with which projectile adjust distance to target (pixel per seconds)

zDistance.description: If defined: Interpolate to this z Distance (with same speed as dist interpolation)

waitUntil.description: If defined: continue spinning until condition evaluates to true. Duration is minimum wait

waitTargetAlign.description: If true: keep rotating until rotate velocity roughly matches direction to target

target.description: Type of target

proxyGroup.description: Group of proxies to align circle around pos with

count.description: Number of proxies that circle around target with even spacing

attribBlock.description: If defined: only consider proxy if attrib is false

missReactTime.description: Reaction time to stop tackle after target has been clearly missed

cancelOnHit.description: If true, cancel tackle once target is hit

withBranches.description: Show branches to handle hit and miss follow up

collideCancel.description: If defined: if angle to collided wall is lower than this value, cancel step

rotateSpeed.description: Speed in which entity will rotate to target. In rotations per seconds.

orthoDirFactor.description: 0= hit target will fly in dash dir. 1= target will fly orthogonally away from dash trail.

ignoreLastHit.description: If true, ignore most recently hit entity

collideSlip.description: If true: when colliding with wall, change dash direction to slip alongside wall.

align.description: Alignment of force relative to entity

yScale.description: Scale of y dimension relative to x. 1 = equally scaled. 0.5 = half y extend.

centralAngle.description: Central Angle of circle attack. 1 = one circle

startAngle.description: Start angle of circle attack relative to front. If not specified startes at - centralAngle / 2

expandRadius.description: How much the radius extends during the sweep

alwaysFull.description: If true, circle is constantly closed.

clockwise.description: If true, sweep clockwise. ccw otherwise.

flipLeftFace.description: If true, flip circle orientation if left faced.

rectangular.description: Collision area is actually not a circle, but a box.

repeat.description: If true, repeat proxy spawning until ended by force (action end or call STOP_REPEATING_FORCE)

uniformHitDir.description: If true, use entity center to determine hit direction rather than force center

fixPos.description: If true: show circle attack at a fixed position

checkCollision.description: If true: check collision before hitting entities

party.description: Override party determine which things are hit

faceCount.description: For how many face directions the effect should be rotated

flipLeftFace.description: If true, flip for left facing directions

value.description: New Z Vel value. Positive for up movement

pull.description: If true: pull entities towards combatant, otherwise, push away

fadeRadius.description: addition Radius in which the strengh is linarly faded to 0

minRadius.description: If defined, force will stop if entity is below that radius

faceDist.description: If defined, place pull center in front of face direction with specified distance

zHeight.description: Z height of push/pull force range

duration.description: Duration of force. -1 will last until action end or call of STOP_REPEATING_FORCE

party.description: Party of force. Combatants of other parties are pushed/pulled. Will use combatant party by default

effect.description: If defined: show effect on combatants influenced by force

align.description: Alignment ot push/pull force

value.description: The time the combatant will be invincible. -1 for constant invincibility. Set to 0 to reset.

killEffect.description: If defined, set Kill effects of generic proxy

clearKillEffect.description: If true, clear kill effect of generic proxy

hp.description: Define to overwrite. If 0: proxy will ignore attack. -1: will take hits but is never destroyed (stops balls) >0: takes hits and can be destroyed

value.description: Value of element filter. NEUTRAL=No Filter.

time.description: How long to dodge the free line.

value.description: The maximum sum of all damage factors of the attack. Damage factors will be scaled down when sum gets close to maximum

Forward ceiling on all attached action proxies

Offset relative to entity ground center from which to shoot

startDist.description: Start Distance of ball in throw direction

startDistAdd.description: Start Distance added for following proxies. Last proxy will be spawned with startDist + startDistAdd distance

startDistCollide.description: If not NONE: consider environment collision before adding start dist. CLOSER = move closer, DROP = Don't spawn if colliding

limitRangeOnColl.description: If true, limit range of spawning depening on collision, check only at beginning

random.description: Spawn each Proxy in random direction within range

duration.description: Time it takes to throw proxies

clockwise.description: If true throw proxies clockwise, otherwise counter clockwise

flipLeftFace.description: If FACE COUNT is provided: swap clockWise if face direction is towards left

offsetArea.description: offset Area around position to randomly spawn entity at

uniformDir.description: To what extend the final dir should be uniform. 1=all the same dir, 0= all individual, 0.5=between the two

repeat.description: If true, repeat proxy spawning until ended by force (action end or call STOP_REPEATING_FORCE)

posEntity.description: If selected: use alternatice entity for spawn center position

pattern.description: Pattern of proxies. 0=no proxy, otherwise n-1 = proxy id

sticking.description: If true: only remove sticking proxies

onlyAfterRemove.description: If true: Only add target if it was previously removed within the action. Use this if the goal is to temporary remove a camera target.
